description: Build a time card from a shift

flags.description: Broker tender job schedule shift ID
flags.name: --broker-tender-job-schedule-shift

flags.description: Customer tender job schedule shift ID
flags.name: --customer-tender-job-schedule-shift

permissions: User must be an admin (BuiltTimeCardPolicy#create? requires is_user_admin?).
side_effects: Creates a built time card from a broker or customer tender job schedule shift and may create or update the underlying time card.
